Soundcity Radio Network bụ redio FM nke Naijiria na ụlọ ọrụ redio dijitalụ zuru ụwa ọnụ nke na-agbaso usoro egwu Top 40 ma bụrụ nke Alphavision Multimedia, onye enyemaka nke Consolidated Media Associates (CMA)
N'ịbụ nke nwere isi ụlọ ọrụ na Lagos, Naijiria, Soundcity Radio Network na-agbasa ozi na mba niile nye ndị na-eto eto.

Soundcity Radio Network music quota na-adabere na egwu Naijiria na ihe karịrị pasenti iri asaa (70%) nke egwu sitere n'aka ndị na-ese ihe n'ógbè ahụ na pasenti iri atọ (30%) kewara n'etiti egwu ndị ọzọ nke Afrịka na mba ọzọ.

Nnyocha nnyefe maka ụlọ ọrụ mbụ maka Soundcity Radio Network, na Lagos, malitere na nkeji iri na ise nke afọ 2016, mana mmemme na OAPs malitere na 18 Julaị. OAP ndị ọzọ sochiri na mgbanwe awa anọ nke ọ bụla.
